title: Blossom Cascade Jhumka: A Symphony of Sparkle and Grace
materials: Finely crafted in a white gold alloy. Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds of FG clarity
features: These Jhumkas feature a delicate cascade of floral motifs, meticulously set with dazzling diamonds. The design incorporates a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian aesthetics, highlighted by the use of fancy pink gemstones and pristine Moti. The unique setting style ensures maximum brilliance and sparkle.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds and white gold alloy)
complemented by soft pink gemstones and creamy ivory pearls. This creates a harmonious and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. These Jhumkas seamlessly blend tradition with contemporary style.
description: These exquisitely crafted Jhumkas offer a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity. The use of high-quality diamonds and genuine Moti ensures lasting brilliance and value. The intricate floral design and unique color combination make these earrings a true conversation starter, reflecting refined taste and unparalleled craftsmanship.
